citation.article-title: Actinospica robiniae gen. nov., sp. nov. and Actinospica acidiphila sp. nov.: proposal for Actinospicaceae fam. nov. and Catenulisporinae subord. nov. in the order Actinomycetales.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: (Ac.ti.no.spi.ca′ce.ae. N.L. fem. n. Actinospica type genus of the family; -aceae ending to denote a family; N.L. fem. pl. n. Actinospicaceae the Actinospica family).
The family contains the type genus Actinospica.

The pattern of 16S rRNA gene signatures consists of nt 127 : 234 (G–C), 129 : 232 (C–G), 344 (G), 449 (C), 450 : 483 (C–G), 560 (U), 576 (G), 590 : 649 (C–G), 591 : 648 (U–R), 859 (G), 952 : 1229 (C–G), 1122 : 1151 (G–C), 1123 : 1150 (U–G), 1124 : 1149 (A–U), and of seven to nine extra nucleotides between positions 1134 and 1140.
The phylogenetic analysis is presented in this study.
